Summary: I was getting inside my car to go to a church meeting and i just happened to glance up to the sky and i saw a bright metalic oval shaped object, it was very shiney, almost like silver, but it was defintely metalic. I saw it close to some clouds.
divs: Sighting Details I was getting in my car to go to a church meeting, an A.R.E. meeting. And as i was getting in my car i looked up at the sky, it was blue and some clouds, and i noticed for a few seconds a bright silvery metal oval or roundish object stationary next to a cloud. I sat in my car and looked again, realizing i had seen a ufo. I had only taken my eyes off it for a few seconds and it was gone. It must have went into the clouds. I kept looking to see if i could see it again, but i didn't. It was almost as if it was watching me, then hid. Thats the feeling i got, like there was defintely a connection, just a gut instinct i guess. I felt it was there for me to see it and then it hid. But this object seemed to have something that went around it in the middle, like maybe windows or huge rivets. It was definetly a ufo, no doubt.
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Lexington
There were no other sightings in Lexington on or around April 21st 2013
